body.p: In February 2007 the Board published an exposure draft State‑controlled Entities and the Definition of a Related Party (the 2007 ED), proposing:

li.p: an exemption from the disclosure requirements in IAS 24 for transactions between entities that are controlled, jointly controlled or significantly influenced by a state (‘state‑controlled entities’); and
amendments to the definition of a related party.
